verses.roman:
ei-mata nānā-līlāya cāturmāsya gela
gauḍa-deśe yāite tabe bhakte ājñā dila

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; nānā-līlāya—in various pastimes; cāturmāsya gela—the four months of the rainy season passed; gauḍa-deśe yāite—to return to Bengal; tabe—at that time; bhakte—all the devotees; ājñā dila—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu ordered.
translation: In this way the Lord spent the four months of the rainy season in various pastimes, and then He ordered the Bengali devotees to return to their homes.
